dmca.title: Google Group DMCA complaint - Craft Design For You
dmca.body:
September 26, 2006
 

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
 

Re: Notice of Copyright and Trademark Infringements on Google Group: FreePatternbyAJ at:  http://groups.google.com/group/freepatternbyaj
 
Dear Sirs,
 

I am the exclusive owner of the copyrights and trademark rights to the following craft booklet and have not granted permission for anyone to post this publicly. On this posting, my trademark and company name, Craft Designs for You, as well as my name, Cherie Marie Leck, and my copyright notice is clearly shown.. The copyrighted work at issue is the posted scans of my booklet as follows:
 

Plastic Canvas Fun Food Coasters: Cookie Jar Set - Copyright 2005 by Cherie Marie Leck
The booklet in its entirety was emailed to all members of this group and is posted online as downloadable files at the following page by Group Owner, Carolyn MacDonald, email address: luv2pc@gmail.com
Message ID: 980386690609191550m1902b83bj5b2cf0ad94861c4f@mail.gmail.com
 

This is a clear violation of International Copyright Law, US Copyright Law (specifically found in United States Code Title 17) as well as a violation of Google
